content:
X509AsymmetricSecurityKey Class

Definition

Represents an asymmetric key for X.509 certificates.

In this Article

public class X509AsymmetricSecurityKey : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AsymmetricSecurityKey
Inheritance
Object
SecurityKey
System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AsymmetricSecurityKey
X509AsymmetricSecurityKey

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Constructors

X509AsymmetricSecurityKey(X509Certificate2)

Initializes a new instance of the X509AsymmetricSecurityKey class using the specified X.509 certificate.

public X509AsymmetricSecurityKey (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2 certificate);
certificate
X509Certificate2

The X509Certificate2 that represents the X.509 certificate.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

certificate is null.

Properties

KeySize

Gets the size, in bits, of the public key associated with the X.509 certificate.

public override int KeySize { get; }
Value
Int32

The size, in bits, of the public key associated with the X.509 certificate.

Methods

DecryptKey(String,Byte[])

Decrypts the specified encrypted key using the specified cryptographic algorithm.

public override byte[] DecryptKey (string algorithm, byte[] keyData);
algorithm
String

The cryptographic algorithm to decrypt the key.

keyData
Byte[]

An array of Byte that contains the encrypted key.

Returns
Byte[]

An array of Byte that contains the decrypted key.

Exceptions
NotSupportedException

The X.509 certificate specified in the constructor does not have a private key.

-or-

The X.509 certificate has a private key, but it was not generated using the RSA algorithm.

-or-

The X.509 certificate has a private key, it was generated using the RSA algorithm, but the stem.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.KeyExchangeAlgorithm* property is null.

-or-

The algorithm parameter is not supported. The supported algorithms are XmlEncRSA15Url and XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl.

Remarks

Use the XmlEncRSA15Url or XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl fields to specify the algorithm.

EncryptKey(String,Byte[])

Encrypts the specified encrypted key using the specified cryptographic algorithm.

public override byte[] EncryptKey (string algorithm, byte[] keyData);
algorithm
String

The cryptographic algorithm to encrypt the key.

keyData
Byte[]

An array of Byte that contains the key to encrypt.

Returns
Byte[]

An array of Byte that contains the encrypted key.

Exceptions
NotSupportedException

The X.509 certificate specified in the constructor has a public key that was not generated using the RSA algorithm.

-or-

The algorithm parameter is not supported. The supported algorithms are XmlEncRSA15Url and XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl.

Remarks

Use the XmlEncRSA15Url or XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl fields to specify the algorithm.

GetAsymmetricAlgorithm(String,Boolean)

Gets the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.

public override System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm GetAsymmetricAlgorithm (string algorithm, bool privateKey);
algorithm
String

The asymmetric algorithm to create.

privateKey
Boolean

true when a private key is required to create the algorithm; otherwise, false.

Returns
AsymmetricAlgorithm

An AsymmetricAlgorithm that represents the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.

Exceptions
NotSupportedException

privateKey is true and the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor does not have a private key.

-or-

algorithm is XmlDsigDSAUrl and the public or private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type DSA.

-or-

algorithm is XmlEncRSA15Url, XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl, XmlDsigRSASHA1Url or RsaSha256Signature and the public or private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type RSA.

-or-

algorithm is not supported. The supported algorithms are XmlDsigDSAUrl, XmlEncRSA15Url, XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl, XmlDsigRSASHA1Url, and RsaSha256Signature.

Remarks

Use the XmlDsigDSAUrl, XmlEncRSA15Url, XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl, XmlDsigRSASHA1Url or RsaSha256Signature fields to specify the algorithm parameter.

GetHashAlgorithmForSignature(String)

Gets a cryptographic algorithm that generates a hash for a digital signature.

public override System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm GetHashAlgorithmForSignature (string algorithm);
algorithm
String

The hash algorithm.

Returns
HashAlgorithm

A HashAlgorithm that generates hashes for digital signatures.

Exceptions
NotSupportedException

algorithm is not supported. The supported algorithms are XmlDsigDSAUrl, XmlDsigRSASHA1Url, and RsaSha256Signature.

Remarks

Use the XmlDsigDSAUrl, XmlDsigRSASHA1Url or RsaSha256Signature fields to specify the algorithm parameter.

GetSignatureDeformatter(String)

Gets the de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature.

public override System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter GetSignatureDeformatter (string algorithm);
algorithm
String

The de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature to get an instance of.

Returns
AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter

An AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter that represents the de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature.

Exceptions
NotSupportedException

algorithm is XmlDsigDSAUrl and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type DSA.

-or-

algorithm is XmlDsigRSASHA1Url or RsaSha256Signature and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type RSA.

-or-

algorithm is not supported. The supported algorithms are XmlDsigDSAUrl,

XmlDsigRSASHA1Url, and RsaSha256Signature.

Remarks

Use the XmlDsigDSAUrl, XmlDsigRSASHA1Url or RsaSha256Signature fields to specify the algorithm parameter.

GetSignatureFormatter(String)

Gets the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.

public override System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter GetSignatureFormatter (string algorithm);
algorithm
String

The formatter algorithm for the digital signature to get an instance of.

Returns
AsymmetricSignatureFormatter

An AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter that represents the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.

Exceptions
NotSupportedException

The X.509 certificate specified in the constructor does not have a private key.

-or-

algorithm is XmlDsigDSAUrl and the private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type DSA.

-or-

algorithm is XmlDsigRSASHA1Url or RsaSha256Signature and the private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type RSA.

-or-

algorithm is not supported. The supported algorithms are XmlDsigDSAUrl,

XmlDsigRSASHA1Url, and RsaSha256Signature.

Remarks

Use the XmlDsigDSAUrl, XmlDsigRSASHA1Url or RsaSha256Signature fields to specify the algorithm parameter.

HasPrivateKey()

Gets a value that indicates whether the private key is a available.

public override bool HasPrivateKey ();
Returns
Boolean

true when the private key is available; otherwise, false.

IsAsymmetricAlgorithm(String)

Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses asymmetric keys.

public override bool IsAsymmetricAlgorithm (string algorithm);
algorithm
String

The cryptographic algorithm.

Returns
Boolean

true when the specified algorithm is DsaSha1Signature, RsaSha1Signature, RsaSha256Signature, RsaOaepKeyWrap, or RsaV15KeyWrap; otherwise, false.

IsSupportedAlgorithm(String)

Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm is supported by this class.

public override bool IsSupportedAlgorithm (string algorithm);
algorithm
String

The cryptographic algorithm.

Returns
Boolean

true when the specified algorithm is XmlDsigDSAUrl, XmlEncRSA15Url, XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl, XmlDsigRSASHA1Url, or RsaSha256Signature and the public key is of the right type; otherwise, false. See the remarks for details.

Remarks

The IsSupportedAlgorithm method returns true when one of the following is true:

  • The algorithm parameter is XmlDsigDSAUrl and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is of type DSA.

  • The algorithm parameter is XmlEncRSA15Url, XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl, XmlDsigRSASHA1Url or RsaSha256Signature and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is of type RSA.

IsSymmetricAlgorithm(String)

Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses symmetric keys.

public override bool IsSymmetricAlgorithm (string algorithm);
algorithm
String

The cryptographic algorithm.

Returns
Boolean

true when the specified algorithm is HmacSha1Signature, Aes128Encryption, Aes192Encryption, Aes256Encryption, TripleDesEncryption, Aes128KeyWrap, Aes192KeyWrap, Aes256KeyWrap, TripleDesKeyWrap, or Psha1KeyDerivation; otherwise, false.
